description: JUnit test class for TodoController, testing REST API endpoints with MockMvc, mocking TodoService interactions.

classes.name: TodoControllerTest
classes.description: Test class for TodoController REST API endpoints, includes tests for create, read, update, delete, and toggle completion.

methods.name: create_success_shouldReturn201AndBody
methods.description: Tests successful creation of a Todo item and correct JSON response.

methods.name: create_validationError_shouldReturn400WithErrors
methods.description: Tests validation failure during Todo creation when input is invalid.

methods.name: list_success_shouldReturn200AndArray
methods.description: Tests listing all Todos returns a JSON array with correct items.

methods.name: getById_notFound_shouldReturn404
methods.description: Tests GET by ID when Todo is not found, expecting 404 response.

methods.name: put_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Tests updating a Todo with valid data, expecting the updated response.

methods.name: put_missingTitle_shouldMapIllegalArgumentTo400
methods.description: Tests that illegal argument exceptions during PUT are mapped to 400 Bad Request.

methods.name: patch_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Tests partial update of a Todo item.

methods.name: toggleComplete_shouldReturnUpdatedState
methods.description: Tests toggling the completion status of a Todo.

methods.name: delete_success_shouldReturn204
methods.description: Tests successful deletion of a Todo, expecting 204 No Content.
